template.p: Indicates how badly damaged this unit is. The unit will be destroyed if more than units of damage are done to it.
How much resources this unit requires to run. If insufficient resources are available, the unit may shut down or be destroyed.

Resources are first looked for in orbit around the current star. If they are not available there, then they will be consumed from cargoships in the current fleet. Beware that they are not looked for in cargoships belonging to a different fleet!

tr.td: This unit is not currently visible to any of your sensors.

tr.th:
Location
The star system this ship is located within.

Unladen mass
The mass of the ship as it comes from the factory, without including any cargo or add-on modules.

Current mass
The mass of the ship including any cargo or add-on modules. This governs how difficult it is to move the fleet and also controls how big a target it is.
